name: kairos-chain
description: Self-amendment MCP server framework with layered skill architecture (L0/L1/L2) and blockchain-backed auditability. Skills can evolve, promote, and audit themselves through 29+ MCP tools. Prerequisites: Ruby 3.0+ and 'gem install kairos-chain' are required for MCP server functionality. Without Ruby, only the Agent Skill (knowledge reference) is available.
